segments.text: I can’t help but chuckle at the sight of the boy balancing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something so reckless about it; he’s a little daredevil reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m almost disgusted at how careless the woman is, what kind of example is she setting?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there with her palm open, almost like a little beggar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s endearing and yet kind of sad, she can’t just take one herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, a stark contrast to the tension building inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how quickly everything could go wrong in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
